MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD1 postcode area of Galashiels. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.30am to make a permanent repair to a faulty underground cable close to the Island Street substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.12am on the 26th of October 2020.
